short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight students who are attended, teacher can know who are absent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use for check attendance of student for teacher when input attendance status in Moodle web. Input list of student ID, all absent students will displayed in red color for teacher to check in checkbox.
